You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesQ Q] > &quot

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&QUOT;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0022/index.htm U+00022].
  * `&QUOT` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0022/index.htm U+00022].
  * `&quot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0022/index.htm U+00022].
  * `&quot` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0022/index.htm U+00022].
